name: Lomi treatments
description: Indulge in this soothing, rejuvenating glow massage that connects your mind and body, with the nurturing touch from the two therapists combining banana leaves, hot stone, shell, shiatsu, and a Hawaiian technique plus an organic facial, to achieve a deep sense of relaxation and rejuvenation.

name: Lomi-Lomi Massage
description: Experience a fusion of Hawaiian and Filipino technique massage that takes you to a state of relaxation and stillness while improving blood circulation and boosting the immune system.

name: Traditional Filipino Hilot
description: This relaxing yet rejuvenating therapy that uses banana leaves and hot stone helps remove toxins and cleanses the body.

name: Stone Massage
description: This therapy uses heated volcanic stone to ease muscle tension and pain, helps reduce muscle spasms, reduces stress and anxiety and promote better sleep quality.

name: Herbal Massage
description: This blend of herbal hot compress massage increases blood circulation and energy flow, reduces mental fatigue and stress and boosts positive energy.

name: Aloevera Massage
description: Moisturize and refresh your skin with this therapy for a glow. Ideal for sunburn and on summer days!

name: Coconut Massage
description: This massage uses pure coconut oil, which is naturally anti-bacterial and anti-fungal, leaving your skin smooth and moisturize.

name: Body Scrub Massage
description: Exfoliate and hydrate your skin with this smooth and soft body scrub massage, promoting efficient circulation.

name: Oil Massage
description: Relax and pamper yourself with our Swedish techniques that decrease stress and increase relaxation.

name: Dry Massage
description: This finger and palm pressure massage, which is mainly applying pressure to specific points on the body, stimulates energy flow.

name: Foot Massage
description: This foot massage is a perfect way to relax, particularly after a long day of standing and walking. It is a soothing finger point pressure kneading massage.
